Package vml

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CART
    CART (Classification And Regression Tree) tree classifier.
    CARTSettings
    Contains settings for the CART classifier.
    Classifier
    Base class for classifiers.
    ClassifierFactory
    Factory class for creating classifiers.
    Dataset
    Container for datasets.
    DataSource
    Reads comma-separated values (csv) data files into a dataset container.
    DimensionalityReduction
    Reduces the size (number of attributes) for a dataset using Dimensionality Reduction.
    EigenDecomp
    Eigendecomposition into Eigenpairs (Eigenvector and Eigenvalue) of a matrix.
    Experiment
    Used to run experiments without showing the GUI.
    HiddenLayer
    Hidden layer using ReLU.
    Instance
    Hold a data instance (example).
    Kernel
    RBF (Radial-Basis Function) Kernel classifier.
    KernelSettings
    Contains settings for the RBF Kernel classifier.
    KNN
    k-Nearest Neighbor classifier.
    KNNSettings
    Contains settings for the k-Nearest Neighbor classifier.
    Linear
    Linear Softmax classifier.
    LSettings
    Contains settings for the Linear Softmax classifier.
    Main
    Main class for the VisualML application.
    Matrix
    Representation of a matrix.
    Metrics
    Calculates the following performance metrics from evaluating a test dataset:
    - Correctly classified instances
    - Accuracy
    - Precision
    - Recall
    - F-score
    - Confusion matrix
    NN
    Neural Network Softmax classifier.
    NNSettings
    Contains settings for the Neural Network classifier.
    OutLayer
    Output layer using Softmax.
    PCA
    Principal-Component Analysis (PCA) dimensionality reduction used to reduce the number of attributes in a dataset.
    RandomForest
    Random Forest classifier.
    RBF
    RBF (Radial-Basis Function) kernel for two categories in the dataset.
    RFSettings
    Contains settings for the RandomForest classifier.
    SVD
    Singular-Value Decomposition (SVD) dimensionality reduction used to reduce the number of attributes in a dataset.
    Vector
    Representation of a vector.
